Blog.post: But life without frenZ it will be veri loney..so how...?? It seemS my frenZ doesn't understand mi.. i was once veri cloze t00 her.. n nw wad happening .. she hav her another frenZ like throwing mi one side.. then enjoying with her frenZ.. last time we go veri where is together n if she going out .. she will ask me whether i wan to go anot... n nw she's going out without asking mi whether wan to go anot.. dat's hurtss.. wad she wanS i buy 4 her like CDs.. n nw i still buy... if i neva buy i like neva treat her like a frenZ..4 should i do.. scared of losing a fren like her ... HOW??? any1 can give mi an answer
Wad i thinK is the lifE is veri brittle..hav to through alot of diffculties.. Frenzship..is we muZ treasurE eacH 0thEr... so wad muZ do to n0e if we cherish each 0ther...??

Yesterday caMe baCk home at 11.30pm... my wh0lE gang we went 4 mY sch0ol band coNcert.. so happy.. there wa$ a lot of ppl.. lucky we brought the tiCketS early if n0t is will haVe to staNd.. my friend helainE dun hav her ticket.. lucky.. at the Last moMent.. my friend perfect found her the last ticketS.. TheN we reach there at r0uNd 6 pluS.. then WE walk arounD n haV fuN.. theN s00N the TimE cuM.. we went in.. wanteD to sit in thE front.. buT my friend wan to sit behind so we sit behiNd.. N we kept fighting oveR thE sit... s0on the concErt goinG to starT s0on.. theN wE hear thE song until waN to slp.. thEn my friends perfect came n tok to Us.. n s0on at arounD 9.45pm.. the conceRt eNd.. but ManY ppl.. kept sh0utiNg ON CALL.. so the baNd continuE to plaY.. N i enD arouNd 10pm.. thEn we went to Macdonalds to celeBratE my friend$ cherYl birthday...

BeeN sick 4 1 weeK.. dunn0 wad to do.. Aiyoyo.. lost my v0ice 4 2 day$ already.. wad should i do... N recently my Ex- ask me to patCh wit him.. wad should i do.. i hav a fear.. no1 noes dat i hav feaR in relationshiP.. but my Ex says that he like mi alot.. n i hav made him cry..Wad should i d0..

Today busy day 4 everyone.. as today is Youth day.. there's a youth day celebratetion... it is so .. the song play by yi cheng N gabrieh...the song that they play is veri niCe..as i today came to school.. i was sick.. then got reali no energy.. then came back straight from school.. my head hurt like hell.. then i took a nap.. juz woke up at 4.30pm.. later hav to go tuition.. i sick also muz g0 ..veri the wad lor... byee.. tmr write again.. if i free..

Todae boring dae.. everyone in the claz hav to give $2.. 4 tmr youth dae.. 4 the needy students in our school.. N my friends n i were veri angry wit a friend.. we have to make a mascrop... then he wanted to do dragon... but we want to do elephant as it represent untited.. then after school.. we hav to collect alot of can to do the mascrop.. then we open the recycled bin .. n took out all the can.. Wow .. its is damn dirty...!! hav to go do homework ...
